data.eml:eml: The genus Eremiothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) from China, with one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Shimeng, Feng, Jinian (2017): The genus Eremiothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) from China, with one new species. Zootaxa 4250 (4): 396-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4250.4.10
